nodes.text: Linasals was a tropical moon located in the Expansion Region. The Ithorian collector Dok-Ondar, who ran the Dok-Ondar's Den of Antiquities shop in the town of Black Spire Outpost on the Outer Rim planet Batuu, imported silk ribbons from Linasals at some point before the smuggler Izal Garsea visited the store in around 34 ABY. Linasals was labeled on a map in the book Traveler's Guide to Batuu, written by the historian Eloc Throno.
Linasals was first mentioned in the 2019 novel A Crash of Fate, written by Zoraida Córdova.
